requirements.license: Hold a valid license and Terms of Reference from the Ministry of Transport of the Kingdom of Morocco.
requirements.fleet: Commit contractually to the age and minimum maintenance of their fleet.
requirements.pricing: Respect the FLIT booking pricing commitment: zero hidden fees or arbitrary surcharge at the airport.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding these T&C, you can contact us via our

preamble.title: PREAMBLE: WHAT WE ARE (AND ESPECIALLY WHAT WE ARE NOT)
preamble.paragraph1: Access to the FLIT platform (hereinafter "the Platform") implies unreserved acceptance of these terms. If you do not agree, leave the site immediately.
preamble.paragraph2: FLIT is a Moroccan company (SARL with capital of [Amount] DH, located at [Address], RC no. [Number]).
preamble.warning: ATTENTION: FLIT is a technical intermediary.
preamble.paragraph3: We are NOT a car rental agency. We do not own any vehicles. The final rental contract is concluded exclusively between you ("the Renter") and the partner rental agency ("the Lessor"). FLIT is not a party to this contract.

article1.title: ARTICLE 1: PURPOSE OF SERVICE
article1.intro: The FLIT service is limited to:
article1.item1: Aggregating offers from verified Moroccan professional lessors.
article1.item2: Enabling secure booking and payment of a deposit or the full service amount.
article1.item3: Transmitting the Renter's contact information to the Lessor.
article1.conclusion: Once the booking is confirmed, FLIT's mission is considered fulfilled.

article2.title: ARTICLE 2: RENTER ELIGIBILITY CONDITIONS
article2.intro: To use FLIT, you certify on your honor:
article2.item1: Being at least 21 years old (or older depending on specific vehicle conditions).
article2.item2: Holding a valid driver's license for at least 2 years.
article2.item3: Having a valid credit card in the main driver's name for the deposit (see Article 5). Debit, prepaid, or "Electron" cards are systematically refused for the deposit. FLIT will not refund a booking cancelled due to lack of a valid credit card at the counter.

section1.title: 3.1 Process
section1.text: The booking is only firm after receiving FLIT's confirmation email AND payment collection.

section2.title: 3.2 Price
section2.text: Prices are displayed in Moroccan Dirhams (MAD). Any currency conversion displayed is indicative. Bank exchange fees remain your responsibility.

section3.title: 3.3 Proof
section3.text: FLIT's computerized records serve as proof between parties for communications, orders, and payments.

article4.title: ARTICLE 4: THE RENTAL CONTRACT AND VEHICLE CONDITION
article4.intro: This is where you need to understand your responsibility:
article4.item1: The rental contract (including vehicle condition report) is signed on-site with the Lessor.
article4.item2: FLIT does not guarantee the exact mechanical or aesthetic condition of the vehicle. Although we audit our partners, we are not in the engine.
article4.item3: Any dispute regarding vehicle condition, breakdown, accident, or fuel must be settled directly with the Lessor. FLIT disclaims all liability in case of vehicle failure.

article5.title: ARTICLE 5: THE DEPOSIT (DEDUCTIBLE)
article5.intro: Do not confuse online payment with the deposit.
article5.item1: A deposit (bank imprint) will be required by the Lessor when picking up the vehicle.
article5.item2: FLIT does not collect the deposit.
article5.item3: If you cannot provide the deposit (insufficient limit, wrong card), the Lessor will refuse the vehicle. In this case,
article5.item3Bold: no refund will be made by FLIT
article5.item3End: . It is your responsibility to manage your bank limits before arriving in Morocco.

article6.title: ARTICLE 6: CANCELLATION AND "NO-SHOW"
article6.intro: Flexibility has a cost. Here is our policy, non-negotiable:
article6.item2Text: No refund. The total amount is retained as compensation.
article6.item3Text: If you do not show up within 2 hours of the scheduled time without notice, the booking is cancelled, the vehicle is re-listed, and 100% of the amount is retained.
article6.item4Text: It is your responsibility to communicate your flight number during booking. If you did not do so and the agency closes, it is your problem.

article7.title: ARTICLE 7: LIMITED LIABILITY OF FLIT
article7.intro: FLIT cannot be held responsible for:
article7.item1: Incorrect information provided by the Lessor (non-contractual photos, missing options).
article7.item2: Inability to access the platform due to maintenance or force majeure.
article7.item3: Indirect damages suffered by the Renter (lost time, lost opportunity, ruined vacation due to breakdown). Our financial liability, should it be engaged, is strictly capped at the commission amount received by FLIT on the transaction.

article8.title: ARTICLE 8: DATA PROTECTION (GDPR & CNDP)
article8.intro: In accordance with Law 09-08, your data is processed for booking management.
article8.item1: You expressly accept that your data (Name, Passport, License) be transferred to the partner Lessor.
article8.item2: This processing has been declared to the CNDP under number [In progress].

contact.title: Questions?
contact.text: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us via our

preamble.title: PREAMBLE AND SCOPE
preamble.text: This Privacy Policy (the "Policy") aims to inform users about how FLIT processes their personal data in accordance with Moroccan Law No. 09-08 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data. Use of the FLIT Platform implies acceptance of this Policy.

subsection1.title: 1.1 Data Controller
subsection1.text: FLIT SARL, whose registered office is located at [Full Address], is the Data Controller for data collected directly through the platform.

subsection2.title: 1.2 Legal Compliance (CNDP)
subsection2.text: Data processing implemented by FLIT has been notified to the CNDP (National Commission for the Control of Personal Data Protection). Proof of this declaration is being obtained and will be published under number [To be inserted] upon receipt.

subsection3.title: 1.3 Partner Lessor (Co-responsibility)
subsection3.text: FLIT is an intermediary. Once the reservation is transmitted, the designated Partner Lessor becomes, in turn, a data controller for the data necessary to establish the physical rental contract on site. FLIT is not responsible for the Lessor's own data retention policy.

section2.title: 2. DATA COLLECTED (EXPLICIT LIST)
section2.intro: By strategic choice, FLIT only collects information strictly necessary to validate and transmit the reservation. We do not collect copies of identity documents (passport, license):
section2.item1Text: Last name, first name, nationality, age declared by the user, phone number and email address.
section2.item2Text: Reservation details (dates, vehicle, options), deposit amount paid. FLIT does not store complete credit card numbers, as management is handled by a certified payment provider (e.g., CMI).
section2.item3Text: IP address, device type used, geolocation data (if granted), and login history for security purposes.

subsection1.title: 3.1 Main Purposes (Contractual Basis)
subsection1.item1: Execution of the reservation service and user account management.
subsection1.item2: Transmission of basic identity and contact information to the Partner Lessor to prepare for pickup.
subsection1.item3: Sending booking confirmations and emergency communications.

subsection2.title: 3.2 Legitimate Interest and Security
subsection2.intro: Data is used in FLIT's legitimate interest to:
subsection2.item1: Ensure platform security and prevent fraud or abuse.
subsection2.item2: Improve services and user experience through statistical analysis (anonymized if possible).

subsection3.title: 3.3 Disclaimer Warning
subsection3.text: FLIT disclaims any obligation to verify the accuracy of information (age, nationality) or the validity of documents (license, passport) that will be required on site by the Lessor. The user is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information provided and for presenting the legal documents necessary for vehicle pickup in Morocco. Any rental refusal by the Partner Lessor due to non-compliant documents will not engage FLIT's liability and will not result in any refund.

subsection1.title: 4.1 Internal and External Recipients
subsection1.intro: Your data is only transmitted to the following third parties, solely for purposes necessary for service execution:
subsection1.item1: The Partner Lessor of your reservation.
subsection1.item2: Our technical service providers (host, emailing platform).
subsection1.item3: Moroccan judicial or administrative authorities, upon legal request.

subsection2.title: 4.2 Prohibition of Sale
subsection2.textEnd: your personal data for commercial marketing purposes to third parties.

subsection1.title: 5.1 Duration
subsection1.text1: Identity and contact data related to the reservation are retained for a maximum period of
subsection1.text2: after the end of the rental contract, to manage potential disputes (fines, claims) with the Lessor or authorities. Beyond that, they are archived for legal purposes or permanently deleted.

subsection2.title: 5.2 Security
subsection2.text: FLIT implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security and confidentiality of your data, including encryption of communications (SSL/TLS) and securing server access.

section6.title: 6. YOUR RIGHTS AND REMEDIES
section6.paragraph1: In accordance with Law 09-08, you have the right to access, rectify, and object to the processing of your data.
section6.paragraph2: To exercise these rights, please send your request (accompanied by a copy of your ID if necessary to verify your identity) to our Data Protection Officer:

section7.title: 7. USE OF COOKIES
section7.text: FLIT uses cookies to ensure proper website functioning (essential cookies) and to measure audience (analytical cookies). A cookie consent management mechanism is provided to users to exercise their choice during their first visit.
